attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like the Culture Minister to provide funding for free entry into the National Waterways Museum so that it has the funding needed for its future survival, in line with free entry into other National Museums.

rejection.details: The title of a petition must be a call to action, not your name.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
